nodes.text: Robot Wars! is an interview with Matt Senreich, Seth Green, Donald Faison, Breckin Meyer, and Abe Benrubi conducted by Chris Spitale and published in Star Wars Insider 111. All five participants are asked about their involvement in Robot Chicken: Star Wars Episode II. Senreich and Green, the creators and producers of the show, discuss the overall production of the show with Faison discussing his involvement. Meyer and Benrubi talk about their respective characters and how they are portrayed in the show (Meyer voices Boba Fett and Admiral Ackbar; Benrubi voices Darth Vader).
